title: A nanoparticle diagnostic for the detection and discrimination of human and avian influenza virus
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The market survey generated through this project has been used to underpin a BBSRC Follow-on Fund bid. Healthcare,Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology
